content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Barrie Craig, Confidential Investigator this week. We’ll hear the September 7, 1954, broadcast titled, Ghosts Don’t Die In Bed.

(30:22) Our second story is The Unholy Two Matter, from Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar. That episode originally aired January 10, 1960.

Download CaseClosed708

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’re able to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
